page.title: 19A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: I get up at 7.30am, get dressed and have my breakfast which is usually cornflakes.Then I go put on my old trousers,coat and wellies while Mum gets the milk ready for the lambs.Next I have to go and feed them.When I come back I do my teeth ,face and put on my skirt. At about 8.40am we set off in the car, or on the tractor, to the end of the lane to catch the school taxi. School starts at 9.00am. First we have registration, then we have Assembly when we sing 2 hymns,say prayers,have a story and answer questions. After that we have English until playtime.Then we do maths until 12noon when it's dinner time.Then play time is on the Campsite field until 1.00pm when we may have art,craft music,science or project.We go home at 3.30pm.I get changed,set the table for tea and watch TV.'til George comes in.
